learning_outcomes.description: Plan therapeutic strategies for managing patients with skin cancer;

Display professional characteristics of a modern practitioner as expected by registration boards such as working with patients in a therapeutic relationship and working as a member of a health care team.

assessments.assessment_title: Clinical Skills Videos and Case Presentation
assessments.task_description: Six clinical skills videos and one clinical presentation is submitted to the discussion board approximately each fortnight. Students then comment about the presentations on the discussion board. The videos will provide 24/30 for the grade, and the clinical presentation 6/30.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date:
23/02/2026 - 29/05/2026

Due dates will be posted on the Learn.UQ (Blackboard) site.
assessments.task_description: Each fortnight an essay style assignment comprising 2 parts will be submitted. This may take the form of an information leaflet for patients, or short answer questions. During the fortnight following submission you will mark the assignments of 2 peers.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date:
2/03/2026 - 29/05/2026

Due dates will be posted on the Learn.UQ (Blackboard) site.
assessments.task_description: You are expected to mark and review, comment and critique constructively and politely on the essays of 2 peers that are allocated to you during the fortnight following submission.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Online examination of 90 minutes duration held during the University exam period.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.

learning_activities.topic:
Clinical Skills Video

Students submit a video or a written presentation to the discussion board of their performing a clinical skill or presenting a case.


Learning outcomes: L01, L02, L03, L04
